jobDescription: Job Title :Data AnalystLocation :Los Angeles, CA.Description: Strong Data Analyst who has worked with data professionally for at least 5 years. This person needs to be well versed in SQL with building and operating data pipelines. The ideal candidate must have experience with SQL Server, SQL and Python. Work with senior client stakeholders as a trusted advisor.Connect data from multiple sources to extract data, uncover findings and support actionable solutions.Build robust data pipeline systemsEvolve data schemas/models to meet new and changing business requirements.Scale up Python algorithms into production applications.Work collaboratively and cross functionally on process improvements that minimize impact and improves data quality standards.Experience with SDFC is a plus. Central Business Solutions, Inc,  37600 Central Ct.  Suite #214  Newark, CA 94560.
